title: Amy Schumer ‘had the best time’ at pal Jennifer Lawrence’s wedding
text:
Amy Schumer and Jennifer are long-time friends (Picture: AP/Getty)

Amy Schumer has said she ‘had the best time’ at Jennifer Lawrence’s A-list wedding.

The comic also hinted at the outfits she and husband Chris Fischer wore to the nuptials in a since-deleted social media post.

The I Feel pretty actress shared a photo of Tilda Swinton as the White Witch in 2015 film ‘The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe’, along with her dwarf servant.

Um, OK.

She shared the pic along with the caption: ‘Chris and I had the best time #balmain.’

Jennifer wed Cooke Maroney on Saturday 20 October in a lavish ceremony in Newport, Rhode Island.

Other celebrity guests at the ceremony included Keeping Up With the Kardashians star Kris Jenner and 21 Bridges actress Sienna Miller.

Kiran Shah and Tilda Swinton in The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion The Witch and the Wardrobe (Picture: Rex Features)

Then, of course, there was also J-Law’s ultimate celebrity BFF, Adele.

Jennifer, who won an Oscar for Best Actress in 2012 for her role in Silver Linings Playbook, reportedly wore a Dior gown for the wedding.

The actresses are close friends (Picture: Getty Images)

Jennifer’s wedding comes after Good Morning Britain host Piers Morgan mocked her on live television for making her wedding registry wish list on Amazon last month.

‘You know what Jennifer,’ he said. ‘It’s all a bit tacky love. Seriously, you’re a great actress, you’ve made brilliant movies and a few turkeys, this is not a good look seriously.’

Cooke Maroney married Jen yesterday in Rhode Island (Picture: Rex Features)

He added: ‘Putting out your cheap and cheerful wedding list on Amazon. Seriously. Not a good look.’
